questionOne.question: What is QuiglyCare?
questionOne.answer: QuiglyCare is a drop-in care service based in Monmouth, Monmouthshire, catering to the surrounding areas. We offer flexible care sessions tailored to individual needs, ranging from 45 minutes to an hour and 30 minutes.

questionTwo.question: How does QuiglyCare determine pricing?
questionTwo.answer: Pricing is determined after a free initial consultation. During this consultation, our experienced caregivers assess individual care needs to provide a personalised and transparent pricing plan.

questionThree.question: What services does QuiglyCare offer?
questionThree.answer: QuiglyCare provides drop-in care services, offering assistance with daily activities, companionship, and support tailored to the unique requirements of each client. Please look at our services section of the website for more in-depth information on the services we provide.

questionFour.question: How long are the care sessions?
questionFour.answer: Care sessions at QuiglyCare are available in two durations: 45 minutes and one hour and 30 minutes, allowing for flexibility to accommodate varying needs. If you would like a specific amount of time outside of this, please contact our team for us to accommodate you.

questionFive.question: How do I book a session with QuiglyCare?
questionFive.answer:
To book a session with QuiglyCare, follow these simple steps:

a. Visit our website: www.quiglycare.co.uk
b. Navigate to the 'Book Now' section.
c. Choose your preferred session duration (45 minutes or 1 hour and 30 minutes). If this is an initial free consultation, please choose that option instead.
d. Fill out the online booking form with your details.
e. Select your preferred date and time for the session from the available options.
f. Submit the form.

Once your booking is received, our team will review your request and confirm the availability of the selected time slot (only available time slots should show on the website, so this section wording could be changed).

You will then receive a confirmation email with details about your upcoming session.

questionSix.question: Is there a minimum or maximum number of sessions I can book?
questionSix.answer: QuiglyCare does not impose a minimum or maximum limit on the number of sessions you can book. We are committed to providing flexible care solutions that suit your individual needs and preferences.

questionSeven.question: Can I request a specific caregiver?
questionSeven.answer: Please toggle the team member you would like to book a session with when making this booking. While we cannot always guarantee the availability of a specific caregiver, we strive to accommodate requests whenever possible. Feel free to mention your preference during the booking process as well, and we will do our best to meet your request.

questionEight.question: What measures does QuiglyCare take to ensure the safety of clients?
questionEight.answer: QuiglyCare prioritises the safety and well-being of our clients. Our caregivers undergo thorough background checks, and we adhere to strict safety protocols to create a secure environment for all clients.

questionNine.question: How can I cancel or reschedule a booked session?
questionNine.answer: To cancel or reschedule a booked session, please contact our customer support team at least 24 hours in advance. We understand that circumstances may change, and we will work with you to find a suitable alternative.

questionTen.question: How can I contact QuiglyCare for additional information or support?
questionTen.answer: For further assistance or inquiries, please reach out to our customer support team via email at quiglycare@gmail.com or by phone at 077875 80370. We are here to help and ensure thatyour experience with QuiglyCare is smooth and satisfactory.
